comments:
Description:
SWTException when insert url type image.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070619

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert an image item.
2. Select URI, click expression button and input "file:\\\\qaant\qa\pictures\pic\a_image.svg", click OK.
3. Click Insert button.

Expected result:
No Exception.

Actual result:
Step2 and Step3 both throw SWTException.
After step3, the image cannot be edited.
